jd: From: Darshana Sakroo, LiveMindz darshanas@livemindz.com Reply to: darshanas@livemindz.com Role: Business Analyst (Temenos T/24)Work Location: Quincy, MA (Hybrid, 3 days onsite/2 days remote) Job Description:10+ years of experience with Security and Capital Markets, Real-Time Payment Processing (RTPS), ISO20002 Messaging StandardsExperience with Temenos T/24 (other similar payments/core banking systems, e.g., Hogan, IBS)Execution of software development and maintenance tasks, and projects staggered across time.Perform technical analysis for projects that support and enable key business initiatives, and for upgrades and enhancements to the existing strategic applications/systems.Modernize banking platform including but not limited to ACI MTS, Universal Payments, RTPS and Temenos platforms.Implement configuration parameters, customization changes, PatchesExperience in Project Management and Functional/UAT TestingAbility to write SQL queries against structured database.Good verbal and written communication skills; analytical problem solver, wellorganized, and self starter
